flyoutPanel.tgAssignListEmptyErrorMessage: Assign roles by selecting roles from the list below and assign target groups by clicking ‘Assign/View Target Group’ button.
flyoutPanel.tgAssignListEmptyFlyoutPanelErrorMessage: At least one Target Group must be assigned
flyoutPanel.newRoleInfoPopup:
Assign Manually: User must manually assign at least one Target Group.
Assign ALL: Predefined Target Group assigns all Network Elements.
Assign NONE: Predefined Target Group assigns no Network Elements.
flyoutPanel.inlineWarningMessage1: Target Group can be assigned only to users which have custom role(s) consisting of specific FM, Topology Browser, CM-CLI, AMOS, ElementManager and CabinetViewer capabilities (see below).
flyoutPanel.inlineWarningMessage2: Assigning Target Group to users with capabilities other than those will result in inconsistent Target Based Access Control (TBAC).
flyoutPanel.inlineWarningMessage3: Only the capabilities on the following resources can be part of the custom role assigned to a user that shall be subject to TBAC: (alarm_export, alarm_overview, alarm_search, open_alarms, nodes, error_event, persistentobjectservice, rootAssociations, topologySearchService, element_manager, amos_em, cm_editor, cm_config, Collections_Public, Collections_Private, CollectionsOthers_Public, SavedSearch_Public, SavedSearch_Private, SavedSearchOther_Public, searchExecutor, modelInformationService, bulkimport, cppinventorysynch_service).

targetGroupPanel.info: Service Target Groups has to be assigned/unassigned by the related button at the top of the Roles table.
targetGroupPanel.tbacWarningMessage: TBAC, at service level, is supported for users that are assigned only a specific custom role containing specific capabilities. (See ENM Identity and Access Management System Administrator Guide for further information)
